graph

Class Graph<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Graph<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of vertex.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BFS<V>, DFS<V>, IGraph<V>

    public class Graph<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraph<V>, BFS<V>, DFS<V>
    This class describes a graph with useful methods to crawl it.
    Author:
    Macky Dieng, Baptiste Vannesson
